I don't want to be self centered, Wanting people to like the things I like is self centered, Posting about the things I like constantly is self centered, I want to return the favor, But I don't know how.

topics.body: I feel that because nearly Everything I post has something to do with me rather than something to do with someone else, (And Recommending shows all the time while mostly refusing recommendations for me.) I'm self centered, And I feel like a bad person.

topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
I'm sorry I disappeared like that. 

"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c356ef6368725e2cf40d00#post_54c356ef6368725e2cf40d00
Well, why don't you work on that by excepting peoples offers more? Like with squiggy and Evangelion. (You even enjoyed that one)

You get to show someone something you like while you get to see something they like. 

And if one of you doesn't like the like the show, Well, different tastes and stuff like that.

But you still watched it or some of it regardless. 

But for now why you take a little bit of a break for the night man. so you can cool off a bit. 

Also you're not selfish man, trust me.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
Alrighty, I'm heading to sleep now.
I'll cya guys.
